translations: n．潜伏期，潜在状态：指事物或现象尚未显现出来的状态，通常用于描述病毒、疾病或技术领域的延迟。

sentences.sentence: VNC is generally less sensitive to network latencies.
sentences.translation: VNC 通常较少受到网络延迟的影响。

sentences.sentence: He set up the application to run on 27 nodes, which reliably gave us good latencies when run at 15x.
sentences.translation: 他将应用程序设置 为在 27 个节点上运行，当以 15 倍运行时延迟会很小。

sentences.sentence: Short deterministic response latencies mean that the embedded system can determine the time it will take to respond to an external event.
sentences.translation: 短暂的确定性响应时间是指嵌入式系统可以确定它对外部事件作出响应的时间。
